works.description:
MOST URGENT! MOST URGENT!! MOST URGENT!!!



> I am Saravanan from PSP Technologies Private Limited, Chennai.



> You have allowed one posting which include our company PSP
> Technologies as fake companies in Chennai.

> It is not true. It is offensive, objectionable and illegal. It is
> strongly condemnable.



> Your illegal posting link is given below:

> http://fakessap.blogspot.com/2008/07/consultants.html



> Our company is registered with REGISTER OF COMPANIES, CHENNAI under
> the companies Act 1956 (NO. 1 of 1956).

> We obey rules and regulations of company law. We do business based on
> the law. Nothing else.

> Also you failed to ask opinion from our side, before you allow this  
> posting.

> According to law, this is punishable.



> You posted this list as NASSCOM list.



> PSP Technologies Private Limited is a member of NASSCOM. There is no
> any fake list in NASSCOM, New Delhi office and its website.



> So, I request you to remove the illegal posting immediately. If you
> don’t remove the posting immediately, WE WILL TAKE IMMEDIATE ACTION
> AGAINST YOU ACCORDING TO LAW. HANDLE THIS MATTER AS VERY URGENT.



> Thanks & Regards,

> P. Saravanan,

> Managing Director,

> Mobile: +91-98413 21679



> PSP Technologies Private Limited,

> S3, II Floor, 15/52A, South West Boag Road,

> T. Nagar, Chennai-600 017, Tamil Nadu, South India.

> Phone: +91-44-2434 1434, 2433 7534

> Telefax: : +91-44-2433 7534

> info@psptech.in       www.psptech.in
